Pre-Game Insights: Colombia is on a 23-match unbeaten run, last defeating Bolivia 3-0.
Paraguay won their previous match 1-0 over Panama, ending a four-match winless streak.
Colombia has not lost an international match in over two years, last beaten by Argentina in 2022.
Paraguay has been strong defensively, conceding a goal or fewer in nine of their last 10 games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is part of the 2024 Copa America Group D.
Colombia has won their opening match in each of the last three editions of the Copa America.
Paraguay has not won a Copa America match against Colombia since 2007.
